text:
Здравейте,

 

Моля за издаване на фактура на HERON с параметрите по приложения файл

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД    



                                                              

 

From: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Monday, December 2, 2024 12:06 PM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Subject: Heron Capacity Commodity Charges

 

Dear team, 

 

Attached below is the summary for HERONs capacity and commodity charges that have to be invoiced.

Payment terms- 5 business days

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

					 

 

	INVOICE format

			 

 

					 

 

No

Description of Goods/Services

Quantity MWh

Price per unit

Amount EUR

 

1

15000

13 740.40

15000

0.250373554

3 755.60

10457

0.2736

€ 2 861.04

 

 

					 

 

					 

 

		Total of Invoice

€ 20 357.04

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Calculations are shown in the second tab of the attached excel file. 

 

Please make sure that add the following statement to HERON with the actual issuance.

 

If any additional costs related to the deal incur to TIBIEL, the latter will issue additional invoice/s to Heron. 

 

Kind Regards,

Stoyan Vasilev

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 892 340 167

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.
